channel.title: 2 Questions PI
channel.description:
1. Is there a way that when u type a command like ::vote, it opens a page to vote. And after you voted, u can type another commands like ::voted to get something for it, but if you didn't vote then ::voted doesn't do anything?
2. How can I make a NPC aggresive?
